channel.title: Only Quote Selected Post (Not Nested Quotes)
channel.description:
Another quote related suggestion I know, but on another forum where I'm a regular (vbulletin based iirc), when you quote a post it only quotes that post, rather than any nested quotes in said post.
This would be great as again, would reduce page length and unnecessary text, and would also prevent the dreaded quote pyramid...
